dialog.text: there is a big water surface with reflection in the image, about 3/5 of the whole image. There is a small area of trees (1/8 height) from left to the middle and (1/10 height) of mountain on the right.
Is there anything in the sky?
yes, it is mainly cloudy (blue tone). Only top 1/8 of the sky is clear blue with no clouds
Does all trees have same hight? Like a rectangle?
the trees and mountains are very far away, so they are much smaller in size. There is a one big cloud (3/4) on the left of the sky.
Is there any shape for the small tree and small mountain?
they are about a long small rectangle shape
Is there any thing in the water?
only reflection. the trees and mountains should be line up together, separating the sky and the water surface
I put tree and mountain on same height. How far between tree and mountain.
they are almost lined up, right next to each other
Is there anything else in the frame?
i dont have any more peek. so i will end the game.
